author: burn
msg: [UIMA-2378] Add getExternalParameterValue to UimaContext so annotators can directly access the external override
settings.  Fix import by name of settings files. Added JUnit tests.

author: dweiss
msg: LUCENE-3847: ignore user.timezone because it is set by java logging system and this is hard to predict.

author: ecn
msg: ACCUMULO-145 remove refs to DISCLAIMER from trunk

author: giger
msg: Allow more than one supporting token of the same type. It is legal per policy spec to have
more tokens as specified in the policy as long as one of them fulfills the policy.
